title: USB-C headphones (from Google) are not being recognized by the Pixel 3XL
content:
The headphones are only intermittently recognized by the device. I have checked the port and cleaned with no visible obstructions. I wont move the device at all and then suddenly playback will stop as if i disconnected the headphones. 

This issue has happened with streaming media and media saved on the device. happens on both Spotify and YouTube apps.
